# Load data

Load targets table with information about samples.

```{r}
targets.org <- read.table(file.path("metadata", "targets.xls"), header = TRUE, sep = "\t", comment.char = "", as.is = TRUE)

targets.org

```

Load Affy CEL data using `oligo` package. Plot the distributions of raw probe expression in all samples.

```{r}
library(oligo)
library(pd.mogene.2.0.st)

ff <- as.character(targets$FileName)

x <- oligo::read.celfiles(filenames = ff)

```


# Normalize data with RMA method

```{r}
eset.org <- oligo::rma(x) 

```

# Leukemia vs. control 

```{r}
####### Keep only the control and leukemia samples

keepSAMPS <- targets.org$ExperimentShort != "afterTreatment" & targets.org$labels != "control_HeLa"

eset <- eset.org[, keepSAMPS]
targets <- targets.org[keepSAMPS, ]


```


## MDS plot


```{r MDS_controls}
library(limma)
labels <- paste0(ifelse(is.na(targets$ctrlRep), "", paste0(targets$ctrlRep, " ")), targets$labels)


mds <- plotMDS(eset, top=1000, col = targets$colors, labels = labels, cex = 1.2, xlim = c(-3, 2))

```


## Heatmaps


```{r Heatmaps_controls, fig.width = 7, fig.height = 10}

library(pheatmap)

### sort samples by groups
ord <- order(targets$groups)
targets <- targets[ord, ]
eset <- eset[ ,ord]

expr <- data.frame(exprs(eset))

### load list of genes of interest

intrGenes <- read.table("Gene_Sets/niche_interaction_genes_niche_binding.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")
intrProbes <- as.character(intrGenes$ProbesetID)

dataHeat <- expr[intrProbes, ]

annotation_col <- targets[, "groups", drop = FALSE]
rownames(annotation_col) <- colnames(dataHeat)

cols <- unique(targets$colors)
names(cols) <- unique(targets$group)
  
annotation_colors = list(groups = cols)

labels_row <- strsplit2(intrGenes$GeneSymbol, " /// ")[, 1]


### Plot of expression scaled per gene 
pheatmap(dataHeat, cluster_cols = FALSE, annotation_col = annotation_col, annotation_colors = annotation_colors, labels_col = targets$groups, labels_row = labels_row, annotation_legend = FALSE, fontsize_row = 8, scale = "row", gaps_col = c(3, 6, 9, 12), breaks =  seq(from = -4, to = 4, length.out = 101), legend_breaks = seq(from = -4, to = 4, by = 2), main = "Niche binding")


### load list of genes of interest

intrGenes <- read.table("Gene_Sets/niche_interaction_genes_niche_formation.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")
intrProbes <- as.character(intrGenes$ProbesetID)

dataHeat <- expr[intrProbes, ]

annotation_col <- targets[, "groups", drop = FALSE]
rownames(annotation_col) <- colnames(dataHeat)

cols <- unique(targets$colors)
names(cols) <- unique(targets$group)

annotation_colors = list(groups = cols)

labels_row <- strsplit2(intrGenes$GeneSymbol, " /// ")[, 1]

### Plot of expression scaled per gene
pheatmap(dataHeat, cluster_cols = FALSE, annotation_col = annotation_col, annotation_colors = annotation_colors, labels_col = targets$groups, labels_row = labels_row, annotation_legend = FALSE, fontsize_row = 8, scale = "row", gaps_col = c(3, 6, 9, 12), breaks =  seq(from = -4, to = 4, length.out = 101), legend_breaks = seq(from = -4, to = 4, by = 2), main = "Niche formation")


```




# After vs. before treatment 

```{r Samps_afterTreatment}
####### Keep only the control and leukemia samples

keepSAMPS <- targets.org$ExperimentShort == "afterTreatment" | targets.org$ExperimentShort == "leukemia"

eset <- eset.org[, keepSAMPS]
targets <- targets.org[keepSAMPS, ]


```


## MDS plot


```{r MDS_afterTreatment}
library(limma)
labels <- targets$labels

mds <- plotMDS(eset, top=1000, col = targets$colors, labels = labels, cex = 1.2, xlim = c(-2, 3))

```
